# Ignore Visual Studio user-specific and temp files
.vs/
x64
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Ignore build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
ipch/
*.log
*.tlog
*.lastbuildstate
*.cache
*.pdb
*.idb
*.ilk

# Ignore CMake generated files
CMakeFiles/
CMakeCache.txt
cmake_install.cmake
Makefile
build/

# Ignore compiled files

*.dll
*.lib
*.exp
*.obj
*.o
*.a

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.dbmdl
*.bak

# Ignore other IDEs/project settings
.idea/
*.VC.db
*.VC.opendb
*.opensdf
*.sdf

# Ignore autogenerated files and folders
GeneratedFiles/
